category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Quick_Access_Queries_Attribute
preference.preference_description:
Defines criteria attributes for quick access queries. Valid Values: Criteria formatted as follows: query_internal_name_SearchAttribute=L10N_key
Where:query_internal_name is replaced by the internal query name. L10N_key is replaced by the query clause user-entry localization key.
